meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Public Speakers
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for public speakers to address the commission.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the October 7, 2024 regular meeting.

agenda_items.title: Staff Reports/Briefings
agenda_items.description: Reports and briefings on Historic Preservation.

agenda_items.title: Briefing Items
agenda_items.description: Training and discussion regarding the Commission’s Rules and Procedures, as well as Robert’s Rules of Order and hearing procedures.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing
agenda_items.description: Public hearing on various agenda items.

financial_items.description: Approval of an estimated $252,845 in expenditures to be spent on rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility.
